original_text: At that time, I will cause a descendant of David to be born. He will be righteous. He will grow like a branch on the tree of David's family. He will do what is right and fair in the land.
korean_text: 그 날 그 때에 내가 다윗에게서 한 공의로운 가지가 나게 하리니 그가 이 땅에 정의와 공의를 실행할 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will cause a descendant of David to be born
He will grow like a branch
on the tree of David's family
He will do what is right and fair
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 옳고 공정한 일을 할 것이다
